sentences: Priscilla Mitchell (September 18, 1941 â€“ September 24, 2014) was an American country music singer.

Priscilla Mitchell began as a Rock 'n' Roll singer in the 1950s as well as a background singer for NRC Records, and became most popular as a duet performer when she cut a string of duet recordings, in the 1960s, with country singer Roy Drusky.
Priscilla graduated from Sprayberry High School in Marietta, Georgia in 1959.

Priscilla Mitchell was married to country singer, songwriter, actor, and session guitarist Jerry Reed from 1959 until his death on September 1, 2008; together they had two daughters who are also country singers.
Mitchell died on September 24, 2014, following a short illness, six days after her 73rd birthday.
